processed: It will be processed within the one business day.

confirmation: The withdrawal confirmation link has been sent to your email and will expire in 30 minutes.
confirm: I confirm that the provided address corresponds to the selected currency

transactionFeeDescription: The network applies a transaction fee, which varies based on blockchain usage. RollerCoin does not charge any transaction fees.
oncePerDay: Withdrawal transactions processed once per day.
withdrawDelay: Withdrawal time depends on the blockchain, and may take up to 7-10 business days.
pleaseNoteThat: Please note that the {{currency}} network fee rate is higher than usual at the moment

tokens.verification: No ID or address verification is required. Yes, we trust you that much :)

depositPage.minDepositText: Due to high transaction fees in {{network}} network, we have temporary limited the minimum {{baseCurrency}} deposit amount to {{value}} {{baseCurrency}}. Please, make sure you don’t send less than this amount as it won’t be deposited to your account and it can’t be refunded. Thank you!
